/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/no-redundant-roles */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import cart from './items.json' export default function Example() { const { closeCart, cartItems } = useShoppingCart(); return (
    {cartItems.map((item) => (

  • {item.name}

    {item.price}

    Qty {item.quantity}

    • ))}

المبلغ الاجمالي

$262.00

Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.

إنتقل للتوصيل والدفع
) }
